verses.1: Kumpipa Lemuel, a nu in a thuhilhna:
verses.2: Kong it mahmah ka ta aw, thu ngenngenin kong neih ka tapa na hi hi. Nangma tungah bang teng hong gen ding ka hi hiam?
verses.3: Na thatang teng numei tungah beisak kei inla, na sum khempeuh numei tungah zang kei in. Numei in kumpipa siasak thei hi.
verses.4: Lemuel aw, ka thugen hong ngai in. Kumpite in zu nek huai lo a, mi ukte in khamtheih zu a duh ding hi lo hi.
verses.5: Zu ne le-uh, thukham mangngilh uh a, thukham hei-in mizawngte gim pia kha thei uh hi.
verses.6: A si dekdekte, khamtheih zu pia inla, a lungkham mahmahte, leenggahzu pia in.
verses.7: Amaute nesak lecin a zawnna uh mangngilhin, a lungkhamna uh phawk nawn lo ding uh hi.
verses.8: Thu a gen thei lo mite adingin thu gensak inla, a huh ding a om lo mite panpih in.
verses.9: Amau ading thu genin thu a tangin khen inla, a zawng a cimawh mite amau adingin a kilawm hamphatna ngahsak in.
verses.10: Zi hoih pen suangmanpha sangin manpha zaw pek a, ahi zongin zi hoih ngah ding haksa mahmah hi.
verses.11: A pasal in muang mahmah a, a inn sung uh ah annek kitasam ngei lo uh hi.
verses.12: Amah in a khan tawntungin a pasal tungah thupha bawl a, a pasal tungah thusia tun ngei lo hi.
verses.13: Amah in samul le khau zongin thanuam takin na sem hi.
verses.14: Amah in sumbukteʼ van pua teembaw bangin gamlapi panin an hong ciahpih hi.
verses.15: Phalvak tungin zingtho a, annek ding teng limtakin bawlin a nasem numeiteʼ sep ding teng a vaihawmsak hi.
verses.16: Amah in leitang hoih penpen zong a, a thalawh sa sum tawh a leenggui lo ding a lei hi.
verses.17: A nik singtenin a puan ban zial a, tha lawp takin na a sem hi.
verses.18: Amah in a nasepte a manphatna thei a, zankim zankhang dongin nakpi takin na a sem hi.
verses.19: Amah in khau kheekin a puan ding gan tawm hi.
verses.20: A zawng mite tungah amah cingh mahmah a, a cimawh mite tungah huhna a pia hi.
verses.21: A innkuan buppi puan lum guan zo ahih manin phalbi tun ding lunghimawh lo hi.
verses.22: Amah in a puan ding khui tawm a, saihadial puan san vive a silh zo hi.
verses.23: Thukhen upate lakah a pasal a tut ciangin miteʼ lakah a kithei kim mi khat ahi hi.
verses.24: Amah in puan khui-in kawnggakte zong bawl a, sumbukte tungah tuate a zuak hi.
verses.25: Amah a tha hatin zong kizahtak a, mailam hun ading a lung patau lo hi.
verses.26: Amah in a pilna tawh thu gen a, kam khum takin pau hiathiat hi.
verses.27: Amah in a innkuan sung kisapna teng sem a, a tawntungin manlah den hi.
verses.28: A tate in amah it mahmah uh a, a pasal in zong pakta mahmah a,
verses.29: “Zi hoih tampi a om tei hangin nang kan a hoih kuamah om kei,” ci-in a phat hi.
verses.30: Ngaihbaanna pen zuaupi hi thei a, melhoihna zong maimang thei hi. Ahi zongin Topa a zahtak numei a phat taak ahi hi.
verses.31: A sepna khempeuh hangin amah phat un. Mi khempeuh in a zahtak dingin a kilawm ahi hi.
